Toggle Menu

salt.modules.haproxyconn

Support for haproxy

New in version 2014.7.0.

disable_server

Syntax

salt.modules.haproxyconn.disable_server(
								name,
								backend,
								socket='/var/run/haproxy.sock'
								)

Disable server in haproxy.

Arguments

Name Description
name

Server to disable
backend

haproxy backend
socket

haproxy stats socket

Details

salt '*' haproxy.disable_server db1.example.com mysql

enable_server

Syntax

salt.modules.haproxyconn.enable_server(
								name,
								backend,
								socket='/var/run/haproxy.sock'
								)

Enable Server in haproxy

Arguments

Name Description
name

Server to enable
backend

haproxy backend
socket

haproxy stats socket

Details

salt '*' haproxy.enable_server web1.example.com www

get_weight

Syntax

salt.modules.haproxyconn.get_weight(
								name,
								backend,
								socket='/var/run/haproxy.sock'
								)

Get server weight

Arguments

Name Description
name

Server name
backend

haproxy backend
socket

haproxy stats socket

Details

salt '*' haproxy.get_weight web1.example.com www

list_servers

Syntax

salt.modules.haproxyconn.list_servers(
								backend,
								socket='/var/run/haproxy.sock'
								)

List servers in haproxy backend.

Arguments

Name Description
backend

haproxy backend
socket

haproxy stats socket

Details

salt '*' haproxy.list_servers mysql

set_weight

Syntax

salt.modules.haproxyconn.set_weight(
								name,
								backend,
								weight=0,
								socket='/var/run/haproxy.sock'
								)

Set server weight

Arguments

Name Description
name

Server name
backend

haproxy backend
weight

Server Weight
socket

haproxy stats socket

Details

salt '*' haproxy.set_weight web1.example.com www 13

show_backends

Syntax

salt.modules.haproxyconn.show_backends(
								socket='/var/run/haproxy.sock'
								)

Show HaProxy Backends

Arguments

Name Description
socket

haproxy stats socket

Details

salt '*' haproxy.show_backends

Syntax

salt.modules.haproxyconn.show_frontends(
								socket='/var/run/haproxy.sock'
								)

Show HaProxy frontends

Arguments

Name Description
socket

haproxy stats socket

Details

salt '*' haproxy.show_frontends
